Ethnic Hilltribe Eco Trails - 2 Day Chiang Dao

Experience a completely off the beaten track hiking trail in some of Chiang Mai, Northern Thailand's most beautiful National Parks. Pha Daeng National Park in Chiang Dao. Rich in fauna and flora. Incredibly scenic and non touristic. Here you will hike one of a kind special hiking trails. Hiking 4 - 5 hours through the heart of the rain forests. Visit waterfalls, view points and on the 2 day trails we will take you to sleep in a hilltribe village in the Mountains of Pha Daeng National Park..

Quick Facts

Price: THB 2,800
Duration: 1 night 2 days
Meal(s): Meals
Difficulty: Medium, has a mix of uphills and downhills
Seasonal: November - February

More Info

Pick Up & Drop Off

Pick up between 7.30 – 8.00 am from your hotel/guesthouse. Arriving back in Chiang Mai around 5.30- 6.30 pm.

Included

Round transfer from and back to accommodation, meals, water, guide, park fees, accommodation and necessary sleeping blankets etc.

Not Included

Extra snacks or soft drinks.

What to Bring

Wear shoes with grip suitable for trekking and climbing, swimsuit for enjoying at the waterfall and pack a warm layer, mornings can be chilly at the summit.

Please support our mission by booking your trek directly with us on this site or by calling us instead of through a tour agency.

Highlights

  • Homestay in Hilltribe village
  • Enjoy the beauty of waterfalls
  • Check out the view point
  • Discover Phae Daeng National Park

Itinerary:

  • Day 1: Pick up between 7.30 – 8.00 am from your hotel/guesthouse
  • We will drive 1 and a half hours to Chiang Dao National Park
  • Stopping at a local market along the journey to get supplies
  • Once we arrive at our starting point we will pass a local school and hike a short 20 - 30 minute to the waterfall
  • We will hike approximately 4 to 5 hours through the rain forest, hiking up the mountain and leveling out parallel to Doi Luang, enjoying the breath taking views of the mountain side and valleys and stopping at another waterfall
  • Stopping for lunch along the way
  • Arrive at homestay in the hilltribe village.
  • Here we will have dinner and you can relax and enjoy nature and scenic views around the village
  • Day 2: In the morning have breakfast and we Begin our next part of our hike.
  • Hiking for approximately 5 hours through the heart of the rainforest enjoying a spectacular view point and the diverse fauna and flora of the national park.
  • Having lunch along the trail.
  • Arriving back in Chiang Mai around 5.30- 6.30 pm

Notes:
